overview:
MonaVie provides nutritional drinks which helps in achieving one’s ideal weight, maintaining an active lifestyle, and keeping the drinker in the peak of health.

The company uses the healthy properties of the acai berry, an elusive type of berry only found on the outskirts of the Amazon. The Acai is rich in antioxidants and other nutrients which helps people stay fit and healthy.

MonaVie is also a multi-level marketing company which has $1 billion sales mark in the last five years.
